exceptions.tactic: destruct (list_exists_dec X A p Hdec) as [Hexists | Hnotexists].
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X Hdec : forall x : X, dec (p x) Hp : exists x : X, x el A /\\ p x The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "list ?X".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
p: X -> Prop
A: list X

Goal:
(forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> (exists x : X, x el A /\ p x) -> {x : X | x el A /\ p x}

Premises:
dec = fun X : Prop => {X} + {~ X} : Prop -> Type Arguments dec _%type_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
list_exists_dec : forall (X : Type) (A : list X) (p : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> dec (exists x : X, x el A /\ p x)
list_exists_DM : forall (X : Type) (A : list X) (p : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> ~ (forall x : X, x el A -> ~ p x) -> exists x : X, x el A /\ p x
list_forall_dec : forall (X : Type) (A : list X) (p : X -> Prop), (forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> dec (forall x : X, x el A -> p x)
cfind : forall (A0 : list ?X) (p0 : ?X -> Prop), (forall x : ?X, dec (p0 x)) -> {x : ?X | x el A0 /\ p0 x} + {forall x : ?X, x el A0 -> ~ p0 x} where ?X : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type]
dependent_choice : forall (X : Set) (R : X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {y : X | R x y}) -> forall x0 : X, {f : nat -> X | f 0 = x0 /\ (forall n : nat, R (f n) (f (S n)))}
exists_to_inhabited_sig : (exists x : ?A, ?P x) -> inhabited {x : ?A | ?P x} where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop]
ssrfun.s2valP' : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?Q (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?T -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?T -> Prop]
ssrfun.s2valP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?P (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?T -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?T -> Prop]
Exists_exists : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), Exists P l < -> (exists x : A, x el l /\ P x)
in_flat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l : list A) (y : B), y el flat_map f l < -> (exists x : A, x el l /\ y el f x)
map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, a el ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?B : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?f : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- list ?A]
ssrfun.svalP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x}, ?P (proj1_sig u) where ?T : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?T -> Prop]
in_concat : forall (A : Type) (l : list (list A)) (y : A), y el concat l < -> (exists x : list A, x el l /\ y el x)
and_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X /\ Y)
dec_DM_impl : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> ~ (X -> Y) -> X /\ ~ Y
eq_sig2_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p0 q : ?Q x), p0 = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop]
eq_sig_rec : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Set, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rect : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Type, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_ind : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Prop, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig2_hprop_iff : (forall (x : ?A) (p0 q : ?Q x), p0 = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, u = v < -> sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop]
existsb_exists : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A), existsb f l = true < -> (exists x : A, x el l /\ f x = true)
in_map_iff : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), y el map f l < -> (exists x : A, f x = y /\ x el l)
dec_DM_and : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> ~ (X /\ Y) -> ~ X \/ ~ Y
proj2_sig_eq : forall p0 : ?u = ?v, eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) (proj1_sig_eq p0) = proj2_sig ?v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p0 q : ?P x), p0 = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop A : list X |- ?A -> Prop]

```coq
intros Hdec Hp.
destruct (list_exists_dec X A p Hdec) as [Hexists | Hnotexists].
- exists (proj1_sig (cfind A p Hdec)).
  split.
  + apply (ssrfun.s2valP' (cfind A p Hdec)).
  + apply (ssrfun.s2valP (cfind A p Hdec)).
- exfalso.
  apply Hnotexists.
  intros x.
  destruct (Hp x) as [Hp|x].
  + left.
    exists x.
    split.
    * apply (ssrfun.svalP (cfind A p Hdec)).
    * assumption.
  + right.
    intro Hx.
    apply x.
    assumption.
Qed.

original: intros Hdec Hp. destruct (list_exists_dec X A p Hdec) as [Hexists | Hnotexists]. - exists (proj1_sig (cfind A p Hdec)). split. + apply (ssrfun.s2valP' (cfind A p Hdec)). + apply (ssrfun.s2valP (cfind A p Hdec)). - exfalso. apply Hnotexists. intros x. destruct (Hp x) as [Hp|x]. + left. exists x. split. * apply (ssrfun.svalP (cfind A p Hdec)). * auto. + right. intro Hx. apply x. auto.
